descriptionHtml:
Do you like reading the books of Skyrim? Are you tired of trying to find them all? Are you a modder in need of books for your mod?
Then this mod is for you!

EveryBook is a small batch file that allows you to obtain every \"normal\" book (including \"notes\" and \"letters\") in the game by use of one console command. (\"notes\" and \"letters\" may be separated at a later date, for now they are included with \"normal books\")

Every Skill Book is a small batch file that allows you to obtain every \"skill\" book.

Please make sure the read the included readme file before use.

[color=\"FF0000\"]Warning:[/color] 

-Save before using.

-Make sure you are standing near some sort of storage as you will be 
over encumbered after using this.

-Some quests require you to find a book. If you have one of those quests and you use this, it will complete the quest for you. 

~Fiddlestyx~

P.s. I like comments and/or suggestions :D

(This is my first mod, if you have any problems or find that I missed any books, please let me know!)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Check out the other \"Every\" mods!

EveryBug in a Jar http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3279

EveryClothes http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3368
author: Fiddlestyx
